name: browser-ext-gemini-summarize
description: This project is a Browser extension that uses Gemini API to summarize text.

scripts.dist:ff:prepare: rm -rf dist/ff-ext-gemini-summarize && mkdir -p dist/ff-ext-gemini-summarize && cp -r icons dist/ff-ext-gemini-summarize && cp -r src dist/ff-ext-gemini-summarize && cp manifest_ff.json  dist/ff-ext-gemini-summarize/manifest.json
scripts.dist:gc:prepare: rm -rf dist/gc-ext-gemini-summarize && mkdir -p dist/gc-ext-gemini-summarize && cp -r icons dist/gc-ext-gemini-summarize && cp -r src dist/gc-ext-gemini-summarize && cp manifest_gc.json  dist/gc-ext-gemini-summarize/manifest.json
scripts.dist:ff:zip: npm run dist:ff:prepare && cd dist/ff-ext-gemini-summarize && zip -r ../ff-ext-gemini-summarize.zip icons manifest.json src && cd ../..
scripts.dist:gc:zip: npm run dist:gc:prepare && cd dist/gc-ext-gemini-summarize && zip -r ../gc-ext-gemini-summarize.zip icons manifest.json src && cd ../..
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run dist:ff:zip && npm run dist:gc:zip
